properties.entry: SELECT I.POST_NO,TITLE,POST_DATE FROM INTEREST_POST I JOIN POST P ON(I.POST_NO = P.POST_NO) LEFT JOIN FOLDER F ON (F.FOLDER_NO = I.FOLDER_NO) WHERE I.FOLDER_NO IS NULL AND I.MEMBER_NO=?
SELECT I.POST_NO,TITLE,POST_DATE FROM INTEREST_POST I JOIN POST P ON(I.POST_NO = P.POST_NO) LEFT JOIN FOLDER F ON (F.FOLDER_NO = I.FOLDER_NO) WHERE I.FOLDER_NO = ? AND I.MEMBER_NO= ?

SELECT I.POST_NO,TITLE,POST_DATE FROM INTEREST_POST I JOIN POST P ON(I.POST_NO = P.POST_NO) LEFT JOIN FOLDER F ON (F.FOLDER_NO = I.FOLDER_NO) WHERE NVL(I.FOLDER_NO,0) = (SELECT NVL(UP_FOLDER_NO,0) UP_FOLDER_NO FROM FOLDER WHERE FOLDER_NO = ?) AND I.MEMBER_NO = ?
